honestly.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to emphasize that what you are saying is true, even though it may seem surprising
honestly.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I honestly don’t know how old my parents are.
I can honestly say that I never worry about him now.
honestly.translation[0].definitions[1].d: used when you are shocked or annoyed by something someone has said or done
honestly.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used to try to make someone believe that what you have just said is true
honestly.translation[0].definitions[3].e: Tell me honestly, Kate, what do you think of John?
